document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">Great </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">streets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">silence </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">led </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Great streets of silence led away
